name: It's All Relative - Famous Relatives Quiz | Celebrities | 10 Questions

questions.text: Who is the son of Roxie Roker (Helen Willis on "The Jeffersons")?
What professional sport did Grant Hill's father play?
questions.explanation:
Football.

	His father is Calvin Hill who played for the Dallas Cowboys.

questions.text: What mother and son combination are the only mother and son to both write a Number 1 song in the United States?
questions.explanation:
Mae and Hoyt Axton.

	Mae wrote "Heartbreak Hotel" (Elvis Presley) and Hoyt wrote "Joy to the World" (Three Dog Night).

questions.text: Who is the daughter of Jon Voight?
Which combination of TV shows DID NOT feature real life relatives (each one of the shows had one sibling)?
questions.correct: 'Fresh Prince of Bel Air' and 'A Different World'
questions.explanation:
'Fresh Prince of Bel Air' and 'A Different World'.

	'Full House' and 'Growing Pains' (Candace and Kirk Cameron), 'Family Ties' and 'The Hogans' (Justine and Jason Bateman), 'Welcome Back Kotter' and 'Charles in Charge' (John and Ellen Travolta).

questions.text: Who was Drew Barrymore named after?
questions.explanation:
Her Great Grandmother.

	Her grandmother's name was Georgie Drew (I just wish it would show the percentage each answer was guessed, I would like to know how many people picked Drew Carey).

questions.text: Which of the following actresses was married to Paul Newman?
Which of the following was NOT a sibling of River Phoenix?
What is the last name of the acting brothers Owen ('Shanghai Noon') and Luke ('My Dog Skip')?
